verses.verse: מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who הֶאֱמִ֖ין <S%H539><s%> he-'e-Min Who hath believed לִשְׁמֻעָתֵ֑נוּ <S%H8052><s%> lish-mu-'a-Te-nu; bruit וּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-Ro-a' has the arm יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who נִגְלָֽתָה׃ <S%H1540><s%> nig-La-tah. revealed

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al For he shall grow up כַּיּוֹנֵ֜ק <S%H3126><s%> kai-yo-Nek him as a tender plant לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before וְכַשֹּׁ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H8328><s%> ve-chash-Sho-resh and as a root מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz ground צִיָּ֔ה <S%H6723><s%> tzi-Yah, out of a dry לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has no תֹ֥אַר <S%H8389><s%> To-'ar he hath no form ל֖וֹ lo וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor הָדָ֑ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar; nor comeliness וְנִרְאֵ֥הוּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-nir-'E-hu and when we shall see וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh him [there is] no beauty וְנֶחְמְדֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2530><s%> ve-nech-me-De-hu. that we should desire

וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu He מְחֹלָ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> me-cho-Lal But he [was] wounded מִפְּשָׁעֵ֔נוּ <S%H6588><s%> mip-pe-sha-'E-nu, for our transgressions מְדֻכָּ֖א <S%H1792><s%> me-duk-Ka [he was] bruised מֵעֲוֹנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> me-'a-vo-no-Tei-nu; for our iniquities מוּסַ֤ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar the chastisement שְׁלוֹמֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H7965><s%> she-lo-Me-nu of our peace עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and by וּבַחֲבֻרָת֖וֹ <S%H2250><s%> u-va-cha-vu-ra-To [was] upon him and with his stripes נִרְפָּא־ <S%H7495><s%> nir-pa- we are healed לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten And he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with רְשָׁעִים֙ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im with the wicked קִבְר֔וֹ <S%H6913><s%> kiv-Ro, his grave וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et was with עָשִׁ֖יר <S%H6223><s%> 'a-Shir and with the rich בְּמֹתָ֑יו <S%H4194><s%> be-mo-Tav; in his death עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas no violence עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, because he had done וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor מִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah neither [was any] deceit בְּפִֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fiv. in his mouth
